name: data
description: Databricks notebooks and Python packages for OpenJII

scripts.install: command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1 && python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt || echo 'Python3 not found, skipping Python package installation'
scripts.build: pnpm run build:multispeq && pnpm run build:ambyte && pnpm run build:enrich
scripts.clean: git clean -xdf .cache .turbo && pnpm run clean:multispeq && pnpm run clean:ambyte && pnpm run clean:enrich
